about_the_game:
Cute and clumsy cats on guard of your good mood! ""1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats 3"" are ready to help you gain positive emotions!

This is an easy to control game, where you can use hints to pass the level, take a short break, while saving the result, or choose a suitable level of difficulty, if the puzzle is not amenable to the first time. The game is thoroughly detailed, so it is suitable for all types of players.

We'll be waiting for you in the world of amazing and charming seals!

- 500 high quality pictures
- clever gameplay: handy hints, sorting and a magnifying glass
- individual difficulty settings for each puzzle allow you to play ad infinitum
- turn off the rotation of puzzle pieces
- the ability to save and continue a puzzle at any moment
- For those who like excitement - special tasks and colourful trophies
- nice relaxing music
- a new installment in the series of games

name: 1001 Jigsaw. Cute Cats 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 or later
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
